subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Cheechoo’s goal 12 minutes 24 seconds into the second period broke a 1-1 tie and the Sharks added to their league-best record with 2-1 victory over the Flames.
snippet: Jonathan Cheechoo’s goal 12 minutes 24 seconds into the second period broke a 1-1 tie and the Sharks added to their league-best record with 2-1 victory over the Flames.
